item.title: Noul site lansat
item.description: Warzone 2100 are acum un site nou-nouț, proiectat de @past-due. Doriți să ajutați? Raportează Erori pe Site Ajută-ne să Traducem Site-ul web

item.title: Știri Arhivate
item.description: Pentru versiuni arhivate şi anunţuri, vă rugăm să consultaţi secţiunea News & anunţuri a forumurilor.

item.title: Webchat
item.description: If you want to arrange online games, or have a quick question to ask, you might want to use one of our chat options: Like Discord? Join the official Warzone 2100 Discord server: YOU'VE BEEN INVITED TO JOIN A SERVER Warzone 2100 Official Server Join Discord Benefits: Pick your nickname, view chat history, easily chat on mobile devices, (optionally) subscribe to receive announcements of new releases, voice chat, and more.
